TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Evidence extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class Evidence Implements ICollection
public ref class Evidence sealed : System::Collections::ICollection
type Evidence = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 定義構成安全性原則決策輸入的資訊集。

span.span: Defines the set of information that constitutes input to security policy decisions.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 常見的辨識項形式包括簽章和程式碼的原始位置，但可能是任何項目。Common forms of evidence include signatures and location of origin of code, but can potentially be anything. 任何類型的安全性原則所辨識的物件表示辨識項。Objects of any type that are recognized by security policy represent evidence. 安全性原則是由所組成的程式碼群組;特定的組件 （用來授與安全性權限的程式碼的基本單位） 是程式碼群組的成員，如果它符合程式碼群組的成員資格條件。Security policy is composed of code groups; a particular assembly (the basic unit of code for granting security permissions) is a member of a code group if it satisfies the code group's membership condition. 辨識項就是使用以判斷組件屬於哪個程式碼群組的成員資格條件的原則集。Evidence is the set of inputs to policy that membership conditions use to determine to which code groups an assembly belongs. 類別是集合 (請參閱) 包含一組代表辨識項的物件。The class is a collection (see ) that holds a set of objects that represent evidence. 這個類別包含對應的兩個集合的辨識項來源： 主辨識項和組件辨識項。This class holds two sets that correspond to the source of the evidence: host evidence and assembly evidence. 原則在評估程式碼的權限時，可以從兩個不同的來源取得的辨識項。Policy can get evidence from two different sources when evaluating permissions for code. - `Host evidence` 由主應用程式，提供並已授與的主機，才可提供權限。`Host evidence` is provided by the host, and can only be provided by hosts that have been granted the permission. 一般而言，這是來源的程式碼和組件上的數位簽章辨識項。Typically, this is evidence of the origin of the code and digital signatures on the assembly. 通常包含有關原始的辨識項， ，和辨識項。Evidence about origin typically includes , , and evidence. 簽章是指軟體發行者 （AuthentiCode X.509v3 簽章） 和強式名稱身分識別而定。Signatures refer to software publisher (AuthentiCode X.509v3 signature) and strong name identities. 這兩種數位簽章為基礎的身分識別所建置的組件，但必須進行驗證並由主應用程式; 傳遞至原則載入時，安全性系統會驗證簽章。Both kinds of digital signature-based identity are built into the assembly, but must be validated and passed to policy by the host; when loaded, the security system verifies the signature. 然後，系統會建立適當的辨識項，並將它傳遞給原則，只有當對應的簽章有效。The system then creates the appropriate evidence and passes it to policy only if the corresponding signature is valid. - `Assembly evidence` 是組件本身的一部分。`Assembly evidence` is part of the assembly itself. 開發人員或系統管理員可以附加至要擴充的原則的辨識項集合的組件的自訂辨識項。Developers or administrators can attach custom evidence to the assembly to extend the set of evidence for policy. 只能在產生組件，這發生在簽署組件之前的時間加入組件辨識項。Assembly evidence can only be added at the time of assembly generation, which occurs before the assembly is signed. 安全性系統的預設原則會忽略組件提供的辨識項，但原則可以擴充以接受它。The default policy of the security system ignores assembly-provided evidence, but policy can be extended to accept it. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立新類別與主辨識項和組件辨識項。The following code example demonstrates how to create new classes with both host evidence and assembly evidence. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Policy.Evidence#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.Evidence/CPP/evidence_evidence.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.Evidence#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.Evidence/CS/evidence_evidence.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.Evidence#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.Evidence/VB/evidence_evidence.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用於衍生自組件的辨識項。Use this method for evidence derived from the assembly. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法不會執行檢查，以防止將新增重複的辨識項的型別。This method does not perform a check to prevent adding duplicate types of evidence. 許多組件辨識項物件可能會位於相同的時間。Many assembly evidence objects can exist at the same time. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 舊版的辨識項，也就是不衍生自的辨識項，無法加入。Legacy evidence, that is, evidence that is not derived from , cannot be added. 只有衍生自的辨識項可以加入。Only evidence that is derived from can be added. 這個方法不允許您將新增的辨識項，如果該型別的辨識項已經存在於組件清單。This method does not allow you to add evidence if evidence of that type already exists in the assembly list.

returns.span: 目前 物件的雜湊碼。

span.span: A hash code for the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相同的辨識項的兩個執行個體的雜湊程式碼可能會不同，因此，雜湊程式碼應該不會用來比較兩個物件。The hash code for two instances of the same evidence might be different, Therefore, hash codes should not be used to compare two objects. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用 GetHashCode 方法。The following code example shows the use of the GetHashCode method. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. ```vb Console.WriteLine(ControlChars.Lf & "Get the hashcode for the evidence.") Console.WriteLine(("HashCode = " & myEvidence.GetHashCode().ToString())) ``` ```csharp Console.WriteLine("\nGet the hashcode for the evidence."); Console.WriteLine("HashCode = " + myEvidence.GetHashCode().ToString()); ``` ```cpp Console::WriteLine( "\nGet the hashcode for the evidence." ); Console::WriteLine( "HashCode = {0}", myEvidence->GetHashCode() ); ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回衍生自的證據類別。This method returns only evidence that is derived from the class. 它不會傳回衍生自其他類別的舊版的辨識項物件。It does not return legacy evidence objects that are derived from other classes.

param.name: evidence
param.span: 要合併到目前辨識項集合的辨識項集合。

span.span: The evidence set to be merged into the current evidence set.

summary.span: 合併指定的辨識項集合到目前的辨識項集合中。

span.span: Merges the specified evidence set into the current evidence set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在指定的辨識項集合中每個辨識項物件會加入的組件和主控件集目前的辨識項集合，根據它所來自的集合。Each evidence object in the specified evidence set is added to the assembly and host sets of the current evidence set, according to the sets from which it came. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法不會執行檢查，以防止將新增重複的辨識項的型別。This method does not perform a check to prevent adding duplicate types of evidence. 許多組件和主控件辨識項物件可能會位於相同的時間。Many assembly and host evidence objects can exist at the same time. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
